cab.content: mOolonel Jones0162(This Document is the Property ofHis -irltaftiilo Majdsfy's Government.)MEMORANDUM FOR WAR CABINETPropaganda at homeI most cordially endorse Sir Edward Carson-s memorandum -Q-rf1.3410 and entirely agree with all that Lord Denbigh says in his letter, I think that the matter calls for very prompt action.COLONIAL OFFICE,24th January, 1918
